item.title: Kcapuani add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kcapuani add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "A children's story that can only be enjoyed by children is not a good children's story in the slightest." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Kcapuani add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "And, has thou slain the Jabberwock? Come to my arms, my beamish boy! O frabjous day! Callooh! Callay! He chortled in his joy." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Kcapuani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. You're on your own. And you know what you know. And YOU are the one who'll decide where to go..." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Kcapuani add a quote by Robert Louis Stevenson
item.description: "You think those dogs will not be in heaven! I tell you they will be there long before any of us." -- Robert Louis Stevenson

item.title: Kcapuani add a quote by Brian Regan
item.description: "You know I could go for a sandwich, but uh, I'm not gonna open two jars. I can't be opening and closing all kinds of jars. And who knows how many knives!" -- Brian Regan
